document.discussion_title: Golden State Warriors' Kevin Looney undergoes surgery at Vail Valley Surgery Center — 5 key points
document.topic_text: Golden State Warriors' Kevin Looney undergoes surgery at Vail Valley Surgery Center — 5 key points Written by Mary Rechtoris | April 25, 2016 Golden State Warriors forward Kevin Looney underwent a left hip arthroscopy at Vail (Colo.) Valley Surgery Center, according to Basketball Insiders. Here are five key points: 1. Marc Philippon, MD, performed the procedure. 2. Mr. Looney had the hip arthroscopy to repair a torn labrum. 3. Dr. Philippon is an orthopedic surgeon and hip specialist who practices at the Steadman Clinic in Vail. 4. He serves as the co-chairman and board member of the Steadman Philippon Research Institute. 5. After earning his medical degree from McMaster University Medical School in Hamilton, Ontario, Canada, Dr. Philippon underwent his orthopedic surgery residency at the University of Miami. More articles on surgery centers:
